table: Assets related to deferred compensation arrangements (see Note 13)

context: Other assets consist of the following (in thousands): (1) In the first quarter of fiscal 2019, we invested 3.0 million Euro ($3.4 million) in 3D-Micromac AG, a private company in Germany.
